toolbar.name: New
toolbar.description: Creates a new project or document.

toolbar.name: Load
toolbar.description: Opens an existing project or file from disk.

toolbar.name: Save
toolbar.description: Saves the current project or document.

toolbar.name: Save As
toolbar.description: Saves the current project under a new name or location.

toolbar.name: Import MVR
toolbar.description: Imports an MVR file into the project.

toolbar.name: Export MVR
toolbar.description: Exports the current project as an MVR file.

toolbar.name: Layout 2D View
toolbar.description: Toggles or applies the 2D view layout.

toolbar.name: Layout Legend
toolbar.description: Shows or hides the layout legend panel.
